description: Data Transfer Object (DTO) class for creating or updating notes, including fields for title, content, and tags, with validation annotations and Swagger schema annotations.

classes.name: NoteRequest
classes.description: DTO class for note creation/updating requests, encapsulating note details with validation and schema annotations.

methods.name: NoteRequest
methods.description: Parameterized constructor for NoteRequest, initializing title, content, and tags.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the note.

methods.name: getTags
methods.description: Returns the list of tags associated with the note.

methods.name: setTags
methods.description: Sets the list of tags for the note.
